title: How to Check an Embarq Email Account

steps.headline: Click one of the link that says Email on the right side of the screen next to Help.
steps.description: Alternatively, you can also click on either of the two Log In links as well if you do not see the Email link.

steps.headline: When the page loads, type your username into the username box.
steps.description: The username is the part before the @centurylink.net.

steps.headline: Select your email domain from the list next to the username box.
steps.description: Usually it says @embarqmail.com, but if your email isn't @embarqmail.com (such as @centurylink.net or @centurytel.net) than you will have to change this to your particular domain.

steps.headline: Type your password into the password box.
If you are returned to the homepage, hit the Email link again and it should take you right into your email.
steps.description: Otherwise, it should automatically bring you in after hitting Log in.

tyn: If you don't have an email account, you will need your account number and either your DSL phone number or Dial Up ID. You can click the Email link and then Create Account to begin creating an account.
text: Visit http://www.centurylink.net  Click one of the link that says Email on the right side of the screen next to Help. Alternatively, you can also click on either of the two Log In links as well if you do not see the Email link. When the page loads, type your username into the username box. The username is the part before the @centurylink.net. Select your email domain from the list next to the username box. Usually it says @embarqmail.com, but if your email isn't @embarqmail.com (such as @centurylink.net or @centurytel.net) than you will have to change this to your particular domain. Type your password into the password box.  Hit Log in.  If you are returned to the homepage, hit the Email link again and it should take you right into your email. Otherwise, it should automatically bring you in after hitting Log in.
sentences: Visit http://www.centurylink.net  Click one of the link that says Email on the right side of the screen next to Help.
Alternatively, you can also click on either of the two Log In links as well if you do not see the Email link.
When the page loads, type your username into the username box.
The username is the part before the @centurylink.net.
Select your email domain from the list next to the username box.
Usually it says @embarqmail.com, but if your email isn't @embarqmail.com (such as @centurylink.net or @centurytel.net) than you will have to change this to your particular domain.
Type your password into the password box.
If you are returned to the homepage, hit the Email link again and it should take you right into your email.
Otherwise, it should automatically bring you in after hitting Log in.
